About me

I'm a twenty-one-year-old full stack web developer based in Buenos Aires, currently studying Global Business Management. I am able to incorporate business knowledge proficiently in the software context.

Due to my previous working experience I am comfortable working with fintech or blockchain-related projects, e-commerce platforms, communities with high traffic volume and user created content, landing pages or marketing-based websites to engage with customers, crowdfunding platforms, social networks, and anything you may have in mind.

TL-DR: full stack web developer, global business student, worked in many areas and projects related to web development. Ready for your inquires.
